verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] [V: signed] [ARG1: a statement] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [C-ARG1: committing to establishing new , peaceful relations] , they also agreed to resolve an issue as old as the Korean conflict itself .

When President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un signed [ARG0: a statement] Tuesday [V: committing] [ARG2: to establishing new , peaceful relations] , they also agreed to resolve an issue as old as the Korean conflict itself .

When [ARG0: President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] signed a statement Tuesday committing to [V: establishing] [ARG1: new , peaceful relations] , they also agreed to resolve an issue as old as the Korean conflict itself .

[ARGM-TMP: When President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un signed a statement Tuesday committing to establishing new , peaceful relations] , [ARG0: they] [ARGM-ADV: also] [V: agreed] [ARG1: to resolve an issue as old as the Korean conflict itself] .

When President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un signed a statement Tuesday committing to establishing new , peaceful relations , [ARG0: they] also agreed to [V: resolve] [ARG1: an issue as old as the Korean conflict itself] .
